reviews.review:
hy guys im selling dbd account with around 5 killers bought and 1 survivor. many cosmetics and 1000 auric cells
DM me
Having a lot of fun playing with friends
Ist halt kein perfektes Spiel, aber an sich mega geil

Now I see why my friend has 2000 hours in this game.

For people who say the game is survivor sided: It is survivor with friends sided. But if you adapt to how certain survivors and their teams play, which you can after a couple chases in a match, then you will get to the 2kills 2escapes the devs are aiming for. As a killer main who uses a fair bit of mind game tactics, if the survivors aren't friends who bring insane gen toolboxes and medkits, I can easily get 2 or 3 kills (I'm also usually red 1). The problem I see with many killers these days that they keep chasing a survivor who's very good at looping, and then tunnel them after they get 3 gens done in the first chase. 

The salt in after game chat is real though holy sheet
I love this game it is a great game if you love scary stuff.
Not if you want to have fun.

good game sometimes scary muy meta
Highly immersive, no other experience like it.

Muy buen juego, para jugar con los amigos y morirse del susto xd
Pero... tienes sus bajas, en el aspecto del buen juego que es tiene muchos bugs y hits falsos
aparte de que su contenido de skins no es muy agradable.

Quite a cool game. Easy to learn, hard to master. 
It's almost 2 different games - as survivor and killer, even though they are just modes.
A thing I'm dissapointed from is the settings - you can't change much. I don't have a powerfull pc so adjusting certain settings is better than a centralised quality setting and the fact I have an ultrawide gives me a disadvantage in some scenarios, because it's vertical FOV that changes with aspect ratio, not horizontal, so I see less. I would just like to have more control over settings.
Game makes me want to kill make a wish children when I play by myself but with friends, I still want to do it.
I wish I was Dead by Daylight

It is a very good game and i am not disappointed after buying this. I recommend this game. you can play as a Survivor or as a Killer whichever you like. You need to repair the generators with out being caught by the killer. I recommend this as it's full of fun.

Despite the game having some glitches, I've had so much fun playing this game with friends, whether it's doing survivor stacks or playing as the killer in a custom game! With it being cross-plat, I can also play with my console friends, which is very nice considering most of my friends don't own PCs. The game does have a bit of a learning curve for perks, offerings, and add-ons, but once you get past that, its insanely fun picking and choosing how you wanna out-run or out-smart a killer and *hopefully* make it out alive.
Spoko gra jednak czasami psycha siada

The game is super fun and one of the few where the developers seem to actually care.
Regular patches, new content, they keep the community updated on the development, etc.

I started playing recently and from what I can see, most of the negative reviews are people that are burnt out from the game.
A great game to play with friends - very addictive!

This game is fun but it's very grindy, the devs don't listen and silence the community. The latest example of that is the lock on recent community news where they asked us to vote for "labour of love" steam awards. It got locked within an hour when the community laughed at their audacity and kept commenting that they won't be doing that.
